title: Presidential hopeful shot in back at campaign rally in Colombia
byline: Bogota: A conservative Colombian senator, a presidential hopeful, has been shot and wounded at a campaign rally in Bogota, authorities say.

title: Security tightened in Anuradhapura for Poson
byline: More than 3,500 police personnel have been deployed to ensure the safety and security of devotees visiting Anuradhapura, Mihintale and the Atamasthanaya for the Poson Poya festival, which begins tomorrow (June 9), police said.

title: Matara Prison to be relocated to Kotawila
byline: Minister of Justice Harshana Nanayakkara said that immediate steps will be taken to relocate the Matara Prison to the Kotawila area, citing severe overcrowding and inadequate facilities at the current site.

title: Trump says relationship with Musk is over
byline: US President Donald Trump has said his relationship with Elon Musk is over.

title: Customs refutes allegations of illegal items in released containers
byline: Sri Lanka Customs has rejected claims that 323 recently released shipping containers contained weapons, narcotics, or gold, confirming that the cargo was limited to industrial goods and raw materials declared by importers.

title: Businessman penalised for selling expired medicines
byline: A businessman has been handed a suspended six-month prison sentence and fined Rs. 10,000 after being found guilty of displaying expired medicines for sale at a pharmacy in the Kawdana area of Dehiwala.

title: Presidential pardon misused, CID finds
byline: An ongoing investigation by the Criminal Investigation Department (CID) into allegations that several inmates were released illegally during the 2025 Vesak period, has revealed that a certain number of inmates were illegally released under the guise of the Presidential Pardon for Vesak this year.

title: Teen dies after taking part in deadly TikTok ‘dusting’ challenge as parents issue stark warning
byline: Arizona teen Renna O’Rourke passed away following a week in an intensive care unit.

title: Sri Lanka’s largest medicine factory enters final phase of construction
byline: The Synergy Pharmaceuticals Corporation (Pvt) Ltd factory, currently under construction within the Bingiriya Export Processing Zone, has reached the final stages of development.

title: Rare Macaw stolen from Dehiwala Zoo
byline: The Dehiwala Police launched an investigation following the theft of a Blue-and-Yellow Macaw, valued at over Rs. 500,000, from the National Zoo in Dehiwala.

title: Four drown in tragic incident in Polonnaruwa
byline: Four individuals drowned today while bathing in the Ellewewa reservoir in Polonnaruwa, police reported.

title: Illegal inmate release: Top prison official arrested
byline: The Assistant Commissioner of the Anuradhapura Prison was arrested this afternoon (8) by the Criminal Investigation Department (CID) in connection with the ongoing probe into the misuse of the Presidential pardon.

title: Opposition to fight it out in Parliament
byline: Alleging that the President’s office and the Prisons Department had made contradictory statements on alleged granting of pardon to a person who was found guilty of misappropriating Rs 4 million just ten days after he was convicted , Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) MP Ajith P. Perera yesterday said he will raise the matter in Parliament during the next sitting week.
